text:
apachectl uses an invalid format of ulimit with the default tru64 shell.
ULIMIT_MAX_FILES="ulimit -S -n `ulimit -H -n`"
To fix this bug we have to use bash.
creator: phil@hetroy.org
trawick@apache.org
text:
this is already fixed and will be in 2.0.45
